biotools.summary: Tool for the analysis of transcriptional regulation that allows you to compare a set of position weight matrices (PWM) against the T-Reg database (a collection of PWMs built from Transfac and Jaspar).

bioschemas.name: T-Reg Comparator
bioschemas.summary: Tool for the analysis of transcriptional regulation that allows you to compare a set of position weight matrices (PWM) against the T-Reg database (a collection of PWMs built from Transfac and Jaspar).
